features: Safeguard Protection: Multiple Built-In Safeguards and Intelligent IC Identification Technology Protect Against Short Circuits, Over-Current, Over-Voltage, Over-Heating, and Over-Charging. Automatically Stops Charging When Is Full to Ensure Your Device Safety and Long Lifetime
Fast Charging: Rapid Fast Charger Charges From 0 to 50% in Just 30 Minutes, 75% Faster Than Standard Chargers

Fast & Sync: Fast Charger Kit Charges Samsung Phones and Tablets with USB 2. 0 Ports At maximum speed. This Charger Set Charges All Other Non-Fast Devices As Well. It Will Charge USB 2. 0 Phones and Tablets That Use Type C Cable At Their Normal Speed. Offers High Speed Transfer of 480 Mbps Designed for Charging and Syncing Smartphones, Tablets, and Bluetooth Speakers.

Compatibility: For Galaxy S23, S23 Plus, S23 Ultra, S22, S22 Plus, S22 Ultra, S21, S21+, S20, S20 Plus, S20 Ultra, S10, S10e, S10Plus, S9, S9+, S8, S8Plus, Note8, Note9, Note10, Note 20, A10, A11, A12, A20, A50, Google Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel XL, LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus, Htc, Zte Axon, Nexus 6p and Other USB Type C Device

Package Included: 2 x Fast Wall Charger, 2 x 6.6ft Type C Charging Cord, 24*7 friendly customer support to ensure your pleasing shopping experience, if there is any quality problem, please contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compatibility List: ( Also Support other USB Type C devices ) **Galaxy S23, S23 Plus, S23 Ultra, S22, S22 Plus, 21, S21 Plus, S21 Ultra, S20, S20 Plus, S20 Ultra, S20FE **Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S8, S8+, S8 Active **Galaxy Note 20, Note 20 Ultra, Note 10, Note 10 Plus, Note 9, Note 8 **Galaxy A02S, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A11, A12 **Galaxy A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A60, A70, A72, A80, A90 **Galaxy Tab A 8.0(2018), Tab A 10.1 (2019), Tab 10.5, Tab A 8.0 What is Fast Charging for Technology "This technology allows the smartphone to use a higher charge capacity, because of this the battery can charge up to 50% faster." Smart-IC Intelligent Technology The smart IC in the charger can regulate the voltage of electric current and prevent your devices from over-current, overheating or overcharging, providing a safe charge. Should I worry that the charger gets hot while charging? "The purpose of this Fast Charging technology is to get the phone charged to a percentage of 50 to 60 percent. During charging, the charger & phone may become very hot. It will cool down after 60% of battery. Therefore, ( Fast Charging ) is actually not use to fully charge a device. Will this product Quick Charge other Android phones? Yes. As long as your device supports Quick Charge/Fast Charge/QC2.0 & QC3.0, our wall charger with Type-C cable will quickly charge your device.

15W Rapid Fast Charger Rapid Fast Charging TechnologyFire-Proof PC+ABS outer shell for maximum heat resistanceBuilt-in device detection for safety and efficient use Specification Input: AC 100~240V 50/60Hz9V - 1.67A, 5V - 2.0ACharging output: Max 15WColor: BlackPackage Content: 2x 15W Charger & 2x 6ft USB to Type C Cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast charger, works well.
reviews.reviewText: When my husband was discharged from the hospital after an illness, he left his charger behind. I ordered this one for him, and it is the best one in the house. It charges quickly and--unlike one of mine--doesn't come easily detached from the wall. The cord length is adequate for where he uses it. Overall, a good product that I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Good, Fast Charge for my Galaxy S8!
reviews.reviewText: I really recommend this product! I was really having very slow charger problems with my Galaxy S8, I didn't know if it was my old fast charger, my battery, or whether I had damaged my phone by dropping it. That question was answered immediately after I plugged in this new charger. It works very fast, my phone charged up in a little less than 90 minutes, and it doesn't get hot (unlike a couple of other reviews I've read on this site). I love the longer cable, and the quality of charger is pretty good, on par with much more expensive ones at the phone store, plus I received two chargers and cables in the package, so I can keep one set in my study and use the other for travel. Definitely good value! I don't know why some folks have had problems with this charger, but perhaps their phone is a different brand than Samsung or just isn't one of the compatible models listed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These chargers are so expensive elsewhere. So glad I found these for my cell phone! They are perfect and fast charging! Love that you get two! Great deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Type C fast charger for Samsung
reviews.reviewText: Product seems great design, etc. It just does not fit in completely the hole in the Samsung phone. It seems like silver part not long enough. It falls out & does nothing to charge. The car and the cable connector does great. Thank you

reviews.reviewText: My phone no longer was charging on the 50 bazillion chargers I have in the house.I read the reviews and immediately bought these.And.... YES! These work! They are fast, fit good... Great . Great. Great.....Buy these if you need fast charging. They work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price but not superb
reviews.reviewText: Both chargers came nicely packages. One charger worked great for a few days and then it always went to "slow charge" message on my phone. Went back to my original charger. I'll try it again soon to see if I still have the same issue
These work great and are very fast to charge.
Bought these for my phone after my charger broke. They work alright but dont charge the fastest. Would recommend for the price and they do the job.
Does what it promises, fast charging and a long cord. Have had no issues with the cords or adapters

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good product and working fine.
